proof.title: Proof of Our Professional Standards

cta.text: Prefer Text? Send Us a Message

faq.heading: ‚ùì Frequently Asked Questions
faq.services_q1: What types of cleaning services do you offer?
faq.services_a1: We specialize in residential and commercial cleaning, including carpet cleaning, deep cleans, move-in/move-out cleaning, and post-renovation services.
faq.services_q2: Do you bring your own supplies and equipment?
faq.services_a2: Yes, we bring eco-friendly cleaning products and professional-grade equipment to every job.
faq.services_q3: Are your cleaning products safe for pets and children?
faq.services_a3: Absolutely. We use non-toxic, eco-friendly products that are safe for both pets and kids.
faq.services_q4: Do you offer one-time cleaning or only recurring services?
faq.services_a4: We offer both one-time cleanings and flexible recurring plans tailored to your needs. Ask us about our tailored options.
faq.services_a5: Yes, you can request extras like window or upholstery cleaning, and appliance deep cleans when booking. Feel free to ask during booking.
faq.process_q1: How do I book a cleaning service?
faq.process_a1: You can book online through our website form, or call/text us directly for quick scheduling.
faq.process_q2: Do I need to be home during the cleaning?
faq.process_a2: Not necessarily. Many clients provide access instructions, and we ensure your property is secure at all times.
faq.process_a3: Yes, all our team members are trained and insured for your peace of mind.
faq.process_a4: We proudly serve the Greater Toronto Area (GTA), including Toronto, Mississauga, Scarborough, North York, and nearby regions. We may service other areas at a transportation service fee to be agreed upon with you during booking.
faq.process_a5: We ask for at least 24 hours‚Äô notice to cancel or reschedule, otherwise a small cancellation fee may apply.
faq.pricing_a1: Pricing depends on the size of your space, type of service, and any custom add-ons requested.
faq.pricing_a2: Yes, we provide free online and phone estimates, and you can also request a custom quote through our website.
faq.pricing_q3: Do you charge extra for travel or service area fees?
faq.pricing_a3: We provide service within our standard coverage area at no additional travel cost. For locations outside our primary service zone, a small travel fee may apply, which we'll discuss upfront when scheduling your appointment.
faq.pricing_q4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.pricing_a4: We currently accept e-transfers and cash. Invoices are provided for transparency.
faq.pricing_q5: Do you offer any discounts or promotions?
faq.pricing_a5: Yes, we run seasonal promotions and first-time client discounts. Check our website or ask when booking for current offers.

blogISSA.title: CleanAR Solutions Joins ISSA Canada: Raising the Bar for Professional Cleaning in Toronto
blogISSA.intro: At CleanAR Solutions, our goal has always been simple: provide reliable, high-quality cleaning services that our clients can trust. Today, we‚Äôre excited to share an important milestone in that journey ‚Äì we are now an official ISSA Canada Member, part of ISSA, the worldwide cleaning industry association.
blogISSA.whoTitle: Who is ISSA and what is ISSA Canada?
blogISSA.whoP1: ISSA is the leading global trade association for the cleaning, hygiene, and facility management industry, with more than 11,000 members worldwide. Its mission is to ‚Äúchange the way the world views cleaning‚Äù by promoting cleaning as an essential investment in human health, the environment, and performance.
blogISSA.whoP2: ISSA Canada represents the Canadian market and helps cleaning companies like ours stay aligned with industry best practices, education, and standards. You can learn more directly from ISSA Canada‚Äôs official website.
blogISSA.meansTitle: What ISSA membership means for our clients
blogISSA.meansP: Membership is not just a logo on our website ‚Äì it reflects how we operate day-to-day. As an ISSA Canada member, CleanAR Solutions is committed to:

meansList.one: Following recognized industry standards for quality and consistency in cleaning.
meansList.two: Prioritizing health and safety in homes, condos, and offices across Toronto.
meansList.three: Staying up to date with training, education, and best practices.
meansList.four: Supporting more environmentally responsible cleaning methods where possible.

blogISSA.standardsTitle: Connecting our work to industry standards
blogISSA.standardsP: ISSA supports programs like the <cimsLink>Cleaning Industry Management Standard (CIMS)</cimsLink>, the global benchmark for management and quality in cleaning operations. While CIMS certification is a separate process, being part of the ISSA community keeps us aligned with the same principles: documented processes, consistent results, and a strong focus on hygiene and customer satisfaction.
blogISSA.torontoTitle: What this means if you‚Äôre a homeowner or business in Toronto
blogISSA.torontoP1: When you hire CleanAR Solutions, you‚Äôre choosing a local Toronto cleaning company that is backed by an international network and standards. That matters when you‚Äôre trusting someone with your home, your building, or your team‚Äôs workspace.
blogISSA.torontoP2: Whether we‚Äôre performing a one-time deep clean, ongoing residential maintenance, or commercial janitorial work, you can expect a higher level of professionalism and accountability.
blogISSA.commitmentP: This is not the end goal ‚Äì it‚Äôs a foundation. We‚Äôll continue to invest in training, equipment, and processes that align with ISSA‚Äôs mission and the needs of our customers in Toronto.
blogISSA.moreP: To see how our professional memberships fit into the bigger picture, visit our <certLink>Professional Certifications & Memberships</certLink> page, or explore our <servicesLink>cleaning services</servicesLink>.
blogISSA.closing: Ready to experience the difference that professional standards make? Get in touch with us for a custom quote for your home or business in Toronto.

cqcc.badgeSubtitle: Certified through Canada‚Äôs Queer Chamber of Commerce (CQCC)
cqcc.description1: CleanAR Solutions is recognized as an LGBTQ+ Certified Supplier (LGBTBE) through Canada‚Äôs Queer Chamber of Commerce (CQCC).
cqcc.description2: This certification supports organizations that track supplier diversity metrics when subcontracting services, while our day-to-day focus remains the same: reliable, professional cleaning results.
cqcc.confidentialNote: Note: CQCC has advised that certificate files should remain confidential for now (branding updates in progress). We do not share certificate images publicly at this time. If you require confidential verification for procurement, contact us.
cqcc.cardTitle: What CQCC certification means for you

badge.headline: CleanAR Solutions is an LGBTQ+ Certified Supplier (LGBTBE)
badge.body: Certified through Canada‚Äôs Queer Chamber of Commerce (CQCC). We support supplier diversity programs while delivering reliable, professional cleaning services.

benefits.reporting: May count toward supplier diversity reporting
benefits.network: Connected to the CQCC supplier network

blogCQCC.title: CleanAR Solutions is Now an LGBTQ+ Certified Supplier (LGBTBE) Through CQCC
blogCQCC.intro: At CleanAR Solutions, professionalism means more than a spotless space ‚Äî it means operating with transparency, accountability, and a long-term commitment to the communities we serve. We‚Äôre proud to share an important milestone: CleanAR is now officially recognized as an LGBTQ+ Certified Supplier (LGBTBE) through Canada‚Äôs Queer Chamber of Commerce (CQCC).
blogCQCC.whatIsTitle: What is CQCC and what does ‚ÄúLGBTBE‚Äù mean?
blogCQCC.whatIsP1: Canada‚Äôs Queer Chamber of Commerce (CQCC) is a national organization that supports LGBTQ+ entrepreneurs and helps connect certified businesses with procurement opportunities, events, and corporate partners.
blogCQCC.whatIsP2: LGBTBE stands for LGBTQ+ Business Enterprise. It‚Äôs a supplier diversity certification that helps organizations identify and engage qualified LGBTQ+-owned businesses in their vendor networks.
blogCQCC.orgMeaningTitle: What this certification means for your organization
blogCQCC.orgMeaningP: This certification doesn‚Äôt change how we clean ‚Äî it strengthens how we show up as a partner for organizations that prioritize inclusive procurement. If your team tracks supplier diversity, engaging CleanAR may support internal procurement goals when we‚Äôre onboarded as a vendor or subcontractor.

orgList.one: Supports inclusive procurement initiatives for organizations that track supplier diversity.
orgList.two: Helps with supplier diversity reporting when cleaning services are subcontracted.
orgList.three: Adds another layer of vendor credibility alongside our professional memberships and standards.

blogCQCC.localTitle: What it means for homeowners and local businesses in Toronto
blogCQCC.localP1: For residential clients and small businesses, the takeaway is simple: you‚Äôre working with a company that invests in being verified, accountable, and consistent ‚Äî not only for quality, but also for how we operate.
blogCQCC.localP2: Whether you hire us for a one-time deep clean, ongoing maintenance, or commercial janitorial services, our goal stays the same: reliable results, respectful service, and clear communication.
blogCQCC.standardsTitle: How this fits into our bigger standards story
blogCQCC.standardsP1: Supplier diversity is one part of building a modern, trustworthy service company. We‚Äôre also committed to professional standards, training, and structured processes that help ensure consistent results across every visit ‚Äî whether it‚Äôs a condo, office, clinic, or multi-unit building.
blogCQCC.standardsP2: Want to see how our credentials connect to service quality? Visit our <certLink>Professional Certifications & Memberships</certLink> page, or explore our <servicesLink>cleaning services</servicesLink>.
blogCQCC.commitmentP: This certification is one more step in building a company that meets professional expectations and modern procurement needs. We‚Äôll continue investing in training, processes, and recognized programs that help us deliver strong outcomes for our clients ‚Äî and operate with integrity as we grow.
blogCQCC.closing: Ready to work with a certified, professional cleaning partner in Toronto? Get in touch for a custom quote for your home or business.

products_and_services.our_services_description: Professional cleaning services for residential and commercial spaces. We offer reliable, high-quality cleaning tailored to your needs. Contact us today for a free quote.
products_and_services.our_products_description: Discover our range of cleaning products and solutions that ensure a spotless home and workplace.
residential_cleaning_description: From kitchen and bathrooms to bedrooms and living areas, we provide thorough top-to-bottom cleaning that leaves every surface spotless and sanitized
Tailored service packages that address your specific needs, from move-in/move-out cleaning to post-construction cleanup and everything in between
Weekly, bi-weekly, monthly, or one-time cleaning appointments that work around your busy lifestyle and personal preferences
We're not satisfied until you are - if anything doesn't meet your expectations, we'll return within 24 hours to make it right at no extra charge
post_construction_cleaning_description: Comprehensive interior cleaning to remove dust, dirt, and construction residues from all surfaces including walls, floors, windows, and fixtures
Safe and efficient removal of construction debris, packaging materials, and leftover supplies to prepare your space for occupancy
Specialized dust removal techniques using HEPA-filtered vacuums and microfiber cloths to ensure a thorough clean without spreading contaminants
Flexible scheduling options to accommodate your project timeline, including same-day service for urgent post-construction cleanups
commercial_cleaning_description: Daily, weekly, or monthly cleaning of offices, retail spaces, warehouses, and commercial buildings including restrooms, break rooms, lobbies, and workspaces
Deep steam cleaning, stain removal, and carpet maintenance services that extend carpet life and maintain a professional appearance for your business
After-hours, weekend, or customized timing options that won't disrupt your business operations, including emergency cleaning services when needed
Professional commercial-grade service with comprehensive insurance coverage, ensuring your business is protected while maintaining the highest cleaning standards
window_cleaning_description: Professional streak-free cleaning of all indoor windows, glass doors, and interior glass surfaces using premium squeegees and eco-friendly solutions
Complete service includes wiping down window frames, sills, and tracks to remove dust, debris, and buildup for a thorough finish
Safe and efficient interior window cleaning for single and two-story homes, including hard-to-reach upper floor windows from the inside
Crystal-clear interior cleaning of retail storefronts, office buildings, and business facades to maintain a professional image for your customers
carpet_cleaning_description: Specialized techniques and solutions for tough stains including wine, pet accidents, grease, and high-traffic wear patterns
Removes dust mites, pet dander, and allergens trapped in carpet fibers, improving indoor air quality for your family or employees.
Complete service includes careful moving and replacement of furniture to ensure thorough cleaning of all accessible carpet areas.
products_and_services.carpet_and_upholstery_button: Get Quote for Carpet and Upholstery Cleaning
power_washing_description: Professional-grade equipment removes years of built-up dirt, grime, mold, and stains from concrete, brick, vinyl, and other exterior surfaces
Transform curb appeal with thorough cleaning of driveways, sidewalks, patios, decks, and home exterior surfaces.
Parking lots, building exteriors, loading docks, and storefront cleaning to maintain professional appearance and safety standards.

about.welcome_text: At CleanAR Solutions, we provide professional cleaning services in Toronto and the GTA. Our focus on excellence ensures every project meets the highest standards, creating a clean and healthy environment. Whether you need residential, commercial, or carpet cleaning, we customize our approach to meet your needs. Get started by requesting a quote, or contact us for more information.
about.partnership_text: We‚Äôre more than cleaners ‚Äî we‚Äôre partners in creating healthier, stress-free environments.
about.mission_text: Our mission is to transform spaces into cleaner, healthier, and more welcoming environments. We achieve this by offering customizable, high-quality cleaning services that are tailored to our clients‚Äô needs while staying true to our commitment to sustainability and excellence.
about.vision_text: Our vision is to become Toronto‚Äôs most trusted and innovative cleaning service provider, setting the standard for excellence while contributing to a cleaner, greener, and happier community.
about.values_intro: At CleanAR Solutions, we are guided by the following values:
values_list: Integrity: We conduct our business with honesty, transparency, and accountability.
Quality: We deliver top-tier cleaning services with attention to detail and excellence.
Customer Focus: We prioritize our clients‚Äô unique needs, building trust through personalized solutions.
Sustainability: We promote eco-friendly cleaning practices to protect our environment.
Teamwork: We value collaboration, respect, and unity to achieve success together.
about.industries_title: Professional Cleaning Services for Every Industry

residential.title: Residential & Multi-Family Properties
items: Comprehensive Common Area Cleaning: Professional maintenance of apartment lobbies, hallways, stairwells, elevators, and recreational facilities to maintain property value and tenant satisfaction.
Exterior Property Maintenance: Power washing of sidewalks, entryways, courtyards, parking areas, and building exteriors to enhance curb appeal and safety.
Waste Management Services: Reliable trash collection, recycling management, and proper disposal of residential waste with eco-friendly practices.

offices.title: Office Buildings & Commercial Spaces
items: Daily Office Cleaning Services: Thorough sanitization of workstations, conference rooms, break areas, and reception areas to maintain a healthy, productive workplace environment.
Professional Floor Care: Expert sweeping, mopping, vacuuming, and floor polishing services for all surface types including carpet, hardwood, and tile flooring.
Restroom Sanitization: Complete disinfection and deep cleaning of office bathrooms, including supply restocking and odor elimination for employee health and comfort.

festivals.title: Event & Festival Cleaning Services
items: Pre-Event Site Preparation: Complete venue cleaning and sanitization before events, including grounds cleanup, vendor area preparation, and waste station setup.
During-Event Maintenance: Continuous cleaning services throughout festivals including restroom maintenance, food service area sanitization, and real-time waste management.
Post-Event Restoration: Comprehensive venue cleanup after events including debris removal, deep sanitization, and complete site restoration to original condition.

certification.title: Professional Certifications & Memberships
certification.intro: Your home or business deserves cleaners who follow recognized industry standards, not guesswork. Our memberships and certifications show our commitment to professional, safe, and healthy cleaning practices in Toronto.

issa.sectionTitle: What is ISSA Canada and why does it matter?
issa.description1: ISSA is the worldwide cleaning industry association, representing more than 11,000 members around the globe, including building service contractors, distributors, manufacturers, and residential cleaners.
issa.description2: ISSA Canada is the Canadian division, supporting the local cleaning industry with education, standards, and advocacy. As members, we stay informed on best practices for health, safety, and quality in cleaning services across Canada.
issa.description3: For our clients, this means you‚Äôre working with a company that takes cleaning seriously ‚Äì not just as a task, but as an investment in a healthier and safer environment for your family, staff, and visitors.
issa.prefix: CleanAR Solutions is a proud member of
issa.linkText: ISSA Canada, a division of ISSA ‚Äì the worldwide cleaning industry association
issa.suffix: . This membership reflects our ongoing commitment to professional standards in the cleaning industry.
issa.cardTitle: What ISSA membership means for you

benefits.health: Added focus on health, hygiene, and safety
benefits.ethics: Commitment to professional conduct and ethics

roadmap.title: Growing our professional standards
roadmap.description1: Our ISSA Canada membership is an important step, and we‚Äôre not stopping there. CleanAR Solutions is continuously exploring additional training and certifications that align with our focus on quality, safety, and sustainability.
roadmap.description2: As we add new certifications, this page will be kept up to date so you can always see how we‚Äôre investing in better service for your home or business.

certification-cta.title: Bring certified standards to your space
certification-cta.description: Whether it‚Äôs a condo, house, or office, we apply the same level of care and professionalism backed by our ISSA Canada membership.

badge.headline: CleanAR Solutions is a proud ISSA Canada Member
badge.body: As members of ISSA Canada ‚Äì the national division of the worldwide cleaning industry association ‚Äì we follow recognized best practices for quality, safety, and professionalism in every service we provide.
